mutants.code:
def find_closest_pair(arr, brr, x):
    n = len(arr)
    m = len(brr)
    l = 1
    s = m - 1
    diff = float('inf')
    res = []
    while l < n and s >= 0:
        current_sum = arr[l] + brr[s]
        current_diff = abs(current_sum - x)
        if current_diff < diff:
            diff = current_diff
            res = [arr[l], brr[s]]
        if current_sum > x:
            s -= 1
        else:
            l += 1
    return res
